attributes.additional_details: We will keep the EU court of human rights and the EU human rights act. We will take down the border and create peace between Northern Ireland and the Republic of Ireland. We will become the tolerant Britain we have grown to once love.
attributes.background: Rejoin the European Union and/or have a second referendum to rejoin the EU. Many were lied to and manipulated into voting to leave the EU and we haven’t had a chance to reconcile.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions that call for a similar action:

Seek to rejoin the EU:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644973

Run a multiple choice referendum on the UK's relationship with the EU #Brexit
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636499
